dbDAO

Class CustomerDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbDAO.CustomerDBDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomerDAO, java.io.Serializable

    public class CustomerDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomerDAO, java.io.Serializable
    The class CustomerDBDAO is the class that do all the required access work with DB using the methods below. implements CustomerDAO and apply the following methods. this class using the SqlQueries class for all the SQL queries in all methods.
    Author:
    user

      • creatCustomer

        public void creatCustomer(Customer customer)
                   throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                          java.lang.InterruptedException,
                          java.sql.SQLException,
                          DuplicateException
        creatCompany method is receiving a company instance and set it to the DB. Creatorclass first checking in front of DB if the customer already exist in case the response is true it will throw an DuplicateException otherwise Creatorclass will set it to DB and return the id number that the DB adjusted to the new customer and save it in sqlId member.
        Specified by:

        Throws:

      • removeCustomer

        public void removeCustomer(Customer customer)
                    throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                           java.sql.SQLException,
                           java.lang.InterruptedException,
                           NotAvailableException
        This method removing all the customer records including coupons that in the customer ownership. SqlExecuteclass checking in front of the DB if the customer exist in case that the response is false it will throw an DuplicateException otherwise it will remove the require customer and he's coupons from all the tables in DB. than return an announcement that this particularly customer has removed.
        Specified by:
        removeCustomer in interface CustomerDAO
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        NotAvailableException

      • getCustomerById

        public Customer getCustomerById(long id)
                         throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                java.sql.SQLException,
                                java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                NotAvailableException
        This method is returning a customer instance from the DB according to the id that received in the method signature. first it will authenticates the id in front of the DB to prevent an exception that could collapse the system in the case there is no customer with the same id and try to point it through an ArrayList. if the SqlExecute check method will return a positive reaction. the CoupList will fill the allCustomer ArrayList and than the Customer will point on the first customer instance and be returned. In case the SqlExecute check method will return a negative reaction it will throw NotAvailableException ArrayList member.
        Specified by:
        getCustomerById in interface CustomerDAO
        Returns:
        customer
        Throws:
        NotAvailableException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • purchaseCoupon

        public void purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon)
                    throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                           java.sql.SQLException,
                           java.lang.InterruptedException,
                           RanOutOfStockException,
                           PurchaseFailedException
        this method is divided to four methods to make all the progress of purchasing coupon be readable. first it will check the existing of the coupon and throw a PurchaseFailedException if it's not been found in DB else it will keep going to the next method.
        Parameters:
        coupon -
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        RanOutOfStockException

                                        RanOutOfStockException,
                                        PurchaseFailedException
        This is the second method of the purchaseCoupon progress. now the check is if the customer own this coupon in case he dose it will throw PurchaseFailedException the system not allowing to purchase coupon more than ones.
